H0.text: How many Copa de America winners medals did Pele and Maradona win between them. 5

H1.text: How many Copa de America winners medals did Pele and Maradona win between them. 3

H2.text: How many Copa de America winners medals did Pele and Maradona win between them. 2

H3.text: How many Copa de America winners medals did Pele and Maradona win between them. 0

A4.text: In the 1959 competition he was named best player of the tournament and was the top scorer with eight goals, as Brazil came second despite being unbeaten in the tournament.
